keyMoments.title: Defeats Hack
keyMoments.description: Bartolomeo eliminates Hack from the Block B battle with a brutal attack, reducing competitors to 24.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Bartolomeo's combat prowess early in the episode.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Bari Bari no Mi Powers
keyMoments.description: After withstanding Elizabello's King Punch, Bartolomeo reveals his Barrier-Barrier Fruit ability, showing he can create impenetrable barriers by crossing his fingers.
keyMoments.significance: First reveal of Bartolomeo's Devil Fruit powers, explaining his invincibility throughout the tournament.
keyMoments.quote: I ate the Bari Bari no Mi! I can create a barrier when I cross my fingers!

keyMoments.title: Uses Barrier Crash
keyMoments.description: Bartolomeo demonstrates the offensive capability of his barrier by launching it at Elizabello II, injuring the king.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that his barriers can be weaponized offensively, not just used defensively.

keyMoments.title: Wins Block B
keyMoments.description: Bartolomeo emerges as the sole victor of Block B, securing his place in the finals.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Bartolomeo as a major contender for the Mera Mera no Mi.

abilities.description: Creates transparent, impenetrable barriers by crossing fingers.
Launches a barrier at high speed to smash into enemies, creating a shockwave.

reveals.information: Ate the Bari Bari no Mi (Barrier-Barrier Fruit)

keyMoments.title: Unleashes King Punch
keyMoments.description: After an hour of preparation, Elizabello unleashes his legendary King Punch, creating a massive shockwave that eliminates all fighters except Bartolomeo.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full power of the King Punch, said to be capable of defeating a Yonko.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Barrier Crash
keyMoments.description: Despite the power of his King Punch, Elizabello is injured and defeated by Bartolomeo's Barrier Crash technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even overwhelming power can be countered by the right defensive ability.

abilities.description: A punch of exceptionally concentrated strength that releases an immense shockwave. Requires one hour of preparation to use at full power. Said to be capable of defeating a Yonko.

reveals.information: Full demonstration of the King Punch's devastating power

keyMoments.title: Defeats Ricky
keyMoments.description: Blue Gilly uses his Jao Kun Do martial arts to defeat Ricky with a powerful kick, wounding him gravely.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Blue Gilly's fighting capabilities as a Longleg Tribe member.

keyMoments.title: Outsmarts Dagama
keyMoments.description: Blue Gilly anticipates Dagama's betrayal and quickly eliminates the strategist from the ring.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Blue Gilly's intelligence and combat awareness.

keyMoments.title: Eliminated by King Punch
keyMoments.description: Blue Gilly is caught in the shockwave of Elizabello's King Punch while preparing to use Shooting Moon.
keyMoments.significance: Ends Blue Gilly's run in the tournament despite his earlier successes.

abilities.description: A martial arts style utilizing powerful leg techniques, enhanced by Blue Gilly's Longleg Tribe physiology.

reveals.information: Demonstrated Jao Kun Do martial arts techniques in combat

keyMoments.title: Double Betrayal Scheme
keyMoments.description: Dagama orchestrates a complex betrayal by manipulating fighters to attack Blue Gilly, then revealing his partnership with Blue Gilly, only to be betrayed himself.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the strategic complexity and ruthless nature of the colosseum competition.

reveals.information: Revealed to be a cunning but ultimately outsmarted strategist willing to betray allies

keyMoments.title: Recruits Franky for SMILE Factory Operation
keyMoments.description: Thunder Soldier reveals his plan to destroy the SMILE factory and offers to explain Dressrosa's dark history to Franky if he's serious about standing against Doflamingo.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the alliance that will be crucial to the rebellion against Doflamingo and sets up the revelation of Dressrosa's past.
keyMoments.quote: If you're seriously going to stand up against Doflamingo, then I will explain the history of Dressrosa.

reveals.information: Revealed plan to destroy the SMILE factory and free imprisoned workers
Possesses knowledge of Dressrosa's hidden history

keyMoments.title: Agrees to Help Thunder Soldier
keyMoments.description: Franky listens to Thunder Soldier's proposal about the SMILE factory operation and prepares to learn about Dressrosa's history.
keyMoments.significance: Commits Franky to a crucial role in the Dressrosa rebellion.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Bartolomeo
keyMoments.description: Bellamy engages in combat with Bartolomeo in an anime-extended scene.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up ongoing tension between these two fighters.
